security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate market research skill with minimal risk. The Python script uses controlled subprocess calls to internal visualization scripts. No network access, no sensitive file access, no credential handling.

low_findings.title: Subprocess execution for visual generation
low_findings.description: The script uses subprocess.run() to invoke sibling visualization scripts. This is intentional and controlled: subprocess calls use list form (no shell injection risk), paths are constructed with pathlib, and only internal skill scripts are called.

content.value_statement: Writing comprehensive market research reports is time-consuming and requires expertise in frameworks, formatting, and visual design. This skill streamlines the entire process by providing structured templates, automated visual generation, and professional LaTeX formatting that matches top consulting firm deliverables.
actual_capabilities: Generate 50+ page professional market research reports with LaTeX formatting
Create 27+ data visualizations including charts, matrices, and diagrams using scientific-schematics
Apply strategic frameworks such as Porter's Five Forces, PESTLE, SWOT, and BCG Matrix
Produce TAM/SAM/SOM market sizing analysis with data-driven projections
Build implementation roadmaps with Gantt charts and milestone trackers
limitations: Does not provide real-time market data; requires integration with research-lookup skill
Report compilation requires LaTeX environment (xelatex, bibtex)
Visual generation depends on scientific-schematics and generate-image skills being available
Does not conduct primary research; relies on secondary data sources

prompt_templates.title: Basic Report Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a comprehensive market research report for the [INDUSTRY/MARKET NAME] market. Include all standard sections: executive summary, market overview, size analysis, competitive landscape, and recommendations. Generate the 5 core visuals using scientific-schematics.

prompt_templates.title: Competitive Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Write the competitive landscape chapter for the [MARKET] market. Include Porter's Five Forces analysis, top 10 competitor profiles with market share, competitive positioning matrix, and strategic group mapping. Generate the 4 competitive visuals.

prompt_templates.title: Strategic Recommendations
prompt_templates.prompt: Develop strategic recommendations for the [MARKET] market. Include opportunity sizing, priority matrix (impact vs effort), implementation roadmap with phases, and financial projections. Generate opportunity, priority, and timeline visuals.

prompt_templates.title: Full Report Delivery
prompt_templates.prompt: Complete the full market research report for [MARKET]. Write all sections with data from research-lookup, integrate all 27 generated visuals, ensure 50+ page length, and compile the LaTeX document with proper bibliography.

output_examples.input: Generate a market research report for the electric vehicle charging infrastructure market.
output: Executive Summary with market snapshot box showing $45.2B market size, 22.1% CAGR
11 structured chapters covering overview, sizing, drivers, competition, customers, technology, regulatory, risks, recommendations, roadmap, and investment thesis
27 professional visualizations: growth trajectory, TAM/SAM/SOM, Porter's Five Forces, positioning matrix, risk heatmap, Gantt chart
LaTeX-formatted document with consulting-style styling ready for PDF compilation

best_practices: Start with the 5-6 core visuals before writing to establish the analytical framework
Use research-lookup skill first to gather current market data and statistics
Follow the report structure guide to ensure all required sections are covered
Generate additional visuals as needed during writing rather than all at once
anti_patterns: Writing the report without generating core visuals first loses the analytical framework
Skipping data sourcing leaves analysis unsupported and reduces credibility
Using fewer than 50 pages suggests incomplete analysis and weak strategic value
Failing to cite sources undermines the professional quality of the deliverable

faq.question: Does this skill include real-time market data?
faq.answer: No. This skill generates the report structure and formatting. Use research-lookup skill to gather current market data, statistics, and competitive intelligence first.

faq.question: What skills does this integrate with?
faq.answer: It requires scientific-schematics for charts/diagrams, generate-image for infographics, and research-lookup for market data. Peer-review can evaluate the final deliverable.

faq.question: How long does report generation take?
faq.answer: Visual generation takes 5-10 minutes for all 27 figures. Report writing time varies by market complexity but typically requires multiple iterations with research data gathering.

faq.question: Can I customize the report template?
faq.answer: Yes. Modify market_report_template.tex for structure or market_research.sty for styling. The skill provides a complete template that can be adapted to specific formats.

faq.question: Is LaTeX compilation required?
faq.answer: Yes. Compile with xelatex for professional PDF output. The template includes auto-generated table of contents, list of figures, and bibliography.

faq.question: What makes this suitable for consulting deliverables?
faq.answer: Professional LaTeX styling, 27+ data visualizations, multi-framework analysis, structured recommendations, and 50+ page depth match top consulting firm standards.
